links.title: 3 Stocks to Buy If Trump Is Impeached
links.description: On Aug. 21, Michael Cohen, Donald Trump's former personal attorney, pled guilty to two felony campaign finance violations, setting in motion a chain of events that could lead to President Donald Trump's impeachment along with several "Trump impeachment stocks" to consider.
